Reviews.Title: waste of money
Reviews.Author: Vinny
Reviews.Content: This is by far the worst phone I ever owned.I have had 3 other Nokia before and have had very good experience with them that's why I bought this one.if you all ask me DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY.i hope you carry a spare phone with you this phone will freeze and you have to wait till it shouts down so you can be able to reuse it at least once a week.I ll give this phone one star for the only reason that it looks good other than that this phone is garbage.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: thais rivera
Reviews.Content: I love this phone, good screen resolution, the camera is excellent, just a little slow ...I always thought that as nokia there ....

Reviews.Title: This is best phone I EVER OWNED))))
Reviews.Author: b-17
Reviews.Content: These is very good phone I ever met it's perfect cellphone I ment what i said ))) what about function it's awesome I can say for sure to everybody to buy these phone!!
